EmailTemplate.subject: Event Reminder: IntApp Webinar Login Information...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IntApp- Webinar Confirmation
Hi,
Thanks for registering for the IntApp Wall Builder Webinar. It will start in half an hour, at 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern / 5pm BST today. Video and audio access instructions are below:
Webinar Title: IntApp Wall Builder
Video:
Conference URL: https://www.livemeeting.com/cc/vcc/join?id=w6449447&role=attend&pw=A644944 Meeting ID: w6449447 Entry Code: A644944
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: US/Canada: 888-617-5714 UK: 0 808 101 1147 Passcode: 6449447
Please log in and dial the conference audio line 5-10 minutes prior to the start time.
